mapper.select: select i.num, i.descripcion, i.fechaRegistro, i.estado, i.areaProponente, u.id as u_id, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.apellido as u_apellido, u.email as u_email, u.telefono as u_telefono, u.tipoUsuario as u_tipoUsuario, u.contrasena as u_contrasena, c.id as c_id , c.idIniciativa as c_idIniciativa, c.idPalabraClave as c_idPalabraClave, d.id as d_id, d.descripcion as d_descripcion from INICIATIVA as i left join USUARIO as u on i.usuarioProponente=u.id left join INICIATIVAPALABRA as c on c.idIniciativa=i.num left join PALABRASCLAVE as d on d.id=c.idPalabraClave WHERE i.num=#{num};
